response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will meet your needs perfectly. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special price of $14,000. This represents an excellent opportunity to acquire a high-quality product at a price that is higher than its intrinsic value to you, ensuring you receive more than what you perceive its worth to be. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of enhancing your business with this outstanding product. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me.", "product_price": 14000}
